---
title: "Import data from pinboard"
subtitle: "`data_import` subproject."
format: html
---

This subproject initializes pinboard required for the default `targets` project.

## Setup

### Targets environment for subproject

```{r}
#| label: set_project
#| include: false
Sys.setenv(TAR_PROJECT = "data_import")
```

### Targets script setup

```{r}
#| label: setup
#| include: false
library(targets)
tar_unscript(script = "_data_import.R")
knitr::opts_chunk$set(tar_script = "_data_import.R", collapse = TRUE, comment = "#>")
```


### Targets globals

We first define some global options/functions common to all targets.

```{r}
#| engine: targets
#| label: globals
#| tar_globals: true

# read custom functions
lapply(list.files(here::here("R"), full.names = TRUE), source)
tar_option_set(packages = packages())
```

## Code

```{r}
#| engine: targets
#| label: code
list(
    tar_target(
        name = test3,
        command = sum(3+9)
    ),
    tar_target(
        name = import_test4,
        command = sum(3+6)
    )
)
```

```{r}
#| label: unset_project
#| include: false
Sys.setenv(TAR_PROJECT = "main")
```
